front.extra:
Writ Petitions filed under Article 226 of the Constitution of India
praying to issue a Writ of Mandamus, to direct the respondents to
forthwith extend the Bar License Period of the Petitioner for the
TASMAC wine shop Nos.4127, 4137, 4323 and 4035 respectively
corresponding to the closure period due to COVID 19 Pandemic, by
considering and passing necessary orders on the representation of the
petitioner dated 25.09.2021.
For Petitioner in all W.P.s
:

standing counsel for
Mr.P.Arumurugarajan
standing counsel for TASMAC
